sentences.en: Arthritis and rheumatism are prominent crippling diseases.
sentences.cn: 关节炎和风湿病是会严重损害身体健康的主要疾病。
严重的类风湿性关节炎会造成四肢变形。
诸如关节炎之类的变性病

sentences.en: He spent three months in the hospital with acute rheumatic arthritis.
sentences.cn: 他患急性风湿性关节炎,在医院住了三个月.

sentences.en: Her hands were misshapen by arthritis.
sentences.cn: 她的双手因为关节炎而扭曲变形了。

sentences.en: His ailments include a mild heart attack and arthritis.
sentences.cn: 他患有轻度心脏病和关节炎.

sentences.en: His hands were gnarled with arthritis.
sentences.cn: 他的双手因患关节炎而扭曲变形。

sentences.en: His movements were painfully impaired by arthritis.
sentences.cn: 他行动不便，深受关节炎之苦。

sentences.en: I have a touch of arthritis in the wrist.
sentences.cn: 我的手腕患有轻微关节炎。

sentences.en: New ways to treat arthritis may provide an alternative to painkillers.
sentences.cn: 关节炎的新疗法可能是止痛药之外的另一种选择。

sentences.en: Rheumatoid arthritis has also been linked with the virus.
sentences.cn: 风湿性关节炎也与这种病毒有关.

sentences.en: Some cases of arthritis respond to a gluten-free diet.
sentences.cn: 无麸质饮食对一些关节炎患者有疗效。

sentences.en: The overcast and rainy weather found out his arthritis.
sentences.cn: 阴雨天使他的关节炎发作了.

sentences.en: The way he can manipulate my leg has helped my arthritis so much.
sentences.cn: 他为我的腿实施的推拿术治疗对我的关节炎大有好处。

phrases.tran_cn: 关节炎，牛皮癣关节炎；银屑病性关节炎
风湿性关节炎；关节风湿病

trans.tran_en: a disease that causes the joints of your body to become swollen and very painful
